ADD_TRIGGER_SUCCESS: Ever shall my lips reply `%WC%` when thou speakest the phrase `%WC%`.
CHOOSE: Mine preference shall be known as %WC%
Thou asketh, and thus I reply %WC%
COMMAND_USAGE: Mayhap thou endeavors shall succeed greater upon uttering `%WC%`
EIGHT_BALL_OPTIONS: It is most certain to come to pass.
Mine efforts to perceive what shall come to pass are unclear. Pray make thine supplication anew.
I shall be taken aback in surprise should thy petition succeed.
EMOTE_STATS_TITLE: I hath counted thy scrawlings thus:
ENHANCE_OPTIONS: Finished - %WC% hast been cured of the Black Death.
Finished - %WC% hast attained a fair maiden's favor.
Finished - %WC% hast attained a fine lord's favor.
Finished - %WC% did inherit seven years' wages
FAMILY_CREATED: Thy company has been established, but is yet lacking in membership.
FAMILY_JOIN_CODE: **Thy company's secret phrase for %WC%**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use this one-time code to join a server to the Family._
FAMILY_JOIN_CODE_INVALIDATED: [Thy secret phrase hast been invalidated by command of the King]
FAMILY_JOINED: Behold! **%WC%** hast pledged loyalty to the great company **%WC%**!
FAMILY_SERVER_LIST: Thy company "%WC%" is beholden to the patriots:
FEEDBACK_COOLDOWN: Pray halt thy requests but for a moment.
FEEDBACK_SENT: :notepad_spiral: Thy request hast been made known. Thou may proceed anew upon the passage of **5 minutes**.
FORUM_WEAPON_CREATED: Thou hast summoned a new Forum Weapon: **%WC%**
FORUM_WEAPON_DUPLICATE: :warning: Pray examine thy request, for a Forum Weapon with that link doth already exist: **%WC%**
FORUM_WEAPON_LIST: Thy strength in the forum doth outnumber all others:
FORUM_WEAPON_UPDATED: Thy weapon hast been updated with a new link!
HANGMAN_DICTIONARIES: Thy tomes include thusly: **%WC%** (or leavest the field blank to use all of them)
INVALID_TRIGGER_TYPE: :scream: Invalid trigger type! Your options are: %WC%
LIST_PRIVACY_TOGGLED: At thy request, the ledger `%WC%` may now be considered `%WC%`.
MUSIC_ADDED_TO_QUEUE: The bard has taken thy request.
MUSIC_LOOPING_TOGGLED: The bard shall replay their song: **%WC%**
MUSIC_LOOPING_QUEUE_TOGGLED: The bard shall replay their set: **%WC%**
MUSIC_PLAYING_PLAYLIST: The bard shall perform thy `%WC%` set.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_CREATED: Thou hast crated a new set `%WC%`.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_CONVERTED: Converted the bard's list into a new set `%WC%` with `%WC%` pieces.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_ADDED: The musical piece hast been added!
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_REMOVED: The musical piece hast been removed!
MUSIC_QUEUED_PLAYLIST: The bard shall remember to play the `%WC%` set!
POLL_TITLE_RESULTS: The Crown hast noted thy supplication.
RESET_EMOTE_STATS: Thy depiction counts hast been reset!
SERVER_FAMILY_LIST: The current company has pledged to the following:
STORY_INTRO: Pray, let us recount a tale!
TALLY_CURRENT_VALUE: The scholar's abacus has raised `%WC%` to `%WC%`
THOUGHTS_OPTIONS: By the Crown, I am taken with awe!
It is a manifestation of beauty and of grace.
Gazing upon its glory inspires one to weep.
I am unable to express mine favor.
It is neither great nor foul.
I find thy object of request lacking in the extreme.
Foul and rancid is its presence.
Its visage offends even the common dogs.
Truly, this creation colors ill the legacy of its maker.
Pray remove this wretched thing from mine presence at once.
Clearest as daylight, it hath ne'ery a wench.
Far better is it to die, I reason.
TIMER_STARTED: :bell: The cathedral's bells shall toll upon the count of the timekeepers %WC%
TIMER_ALERT: :bell: (%WC%): The timekeepers hath counted thy measure!
TRIGGER_LIST: Mine ears listen carefully for thus:
WHAT_ARE_THE_ODDS: Mayhap it shall be close to %WC%
WHATSHOULDIDO_INTRO_OPTIONS: Indeed, it wouldst bring glory to the Crown should thee
WHATSHOULDIDO_OPTIONS: conduct theft of a sundry merchant
consume the food of an infant
re-enact the plot of a foreign play
begin a crusade to attain justice for horse prices
hail curses at an old crone
donate to a charity of low repute
compose false letters to a noble house
market tonics and salves to children
petition a lowly merchant to trade responsibilities
exploit the elderly and stir confusion
hurl eggs at a flock of birds
borrow a tome, bathe it in the sap of a pine tree, and return it to its owner
erect signage in the public square regarding thy deepest insecurities
engage in a rousing game of lots
leave thy house and acquire a maiden
abandon thy village and seek a young lord
WHEN_OPTIONS: When the sand in thy hourglass fall empty

ALREADY_EXISTS: Alas, thy requested item exists already.
BOT_ERROR: Mine humblest apologies, for thy request did cause an unforeseen catastrophe.
CANNOT_DELETE: Should I answer thy request, I would find myself distraught and unable to carry out further duties.
CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: Nay, a forum with such a name cannot be found.
COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: Nay, a command with such a name hast not yet been decreed.
FAMILY_ALREADY_EXISTS: You already own a family with that name! Please choose a different name.
FAMILY_ALREADY_JOINED: This server already belongs to that family!
FAMILY_INVALID_DETAIL: Invalid Family name or Join Code!
FAMILY_NOT_JOINED: That server has not joined that Family!
FAMILY_MEMBER_MAXIMUM_REACHED: That family has reached the maximum number of servers!
FAMILY_MAXIMUM_REACHED: You can only join up to 3 families!
FAMILY_SERVER_LIST_EMPTY: This Family does not contain any servers.
FORUM_WEAPON_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Sorry! I can only keep up to 100 weapons. Please remove some existing weapons before creating more.
FORUM_WEAPON_OWNED_OTHER: That weapon is owned by a different server!
GUILD_REQUIRED: That command must be run on a server.
HANGMAN_ALREADY_STARTED: Alas, the gallows are already hung in the %WC% square
HANGMAN_ALREADY_GUESSED: The executioner hast heard thy cry already.
HANGMAN_NOT_STARTED: The gallows hast not yet been hung. Mayhap they shall be soon.
HEY_THERE: Hail to the crown! Makest thy request with `%WC% help`
INCOMPLETE: I'm gonna need a few more details.
MUSIC_NOT_IN_CHANNEL: Please join a voice channel and run this command again.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Playlist with that name already exists on this server!
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_NAME_MISSING: Please enter a name for the new Playlist.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Playlists currently support a max of 50 tracks.
MUSIC_QUEUE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue.
MUSIC_QUEUE_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue on this page.
MUSIC_WRONG_INPUT: Please enter a media URL or playlist name!
NO_PERMISSION_BOT: Behold, I am wont to complete thy request, yet the laws forbid me.
NO_PERMISSION_USER: Behold, I have been tasked to forbid thee this access.
NOT_FOUND: An item of such title could not be uncovered.
PAGE_NOT_FOUND: The page you requested is empty or does not exist.
RESERVED_WORD: It looks like you tried to use a reserved word. Try a different one!
SERVER_FAMILY_LIST_EMPTY: This server does not belong to a Family.
SETTING_VALUE_INVALID: The value you provided is invalid. Please try again.
TIME_VALUE_INCORRECT: The amount of time provided is invalid!
TIMER_LENGTH_INCORRECT: Timers must be set between 1 second and 365 days.
TRACK_NOT_PLAYING: There isn't a track playing right now.
WRONG_USAGE: Alas, I have heard thy request, and I declare it improper. Pray make thine attempt anew.
